name: Let's Connect
description:
This is an indie Connect-4 game where 2 players can play with a mouse. Player will perform 1 action per turn where she will drop the coin on top of the board. The coin will fall to the respective slots. Whomever reaches 4 connections (horizontal, vertical, or diagonal) will win.

Cheat: Press "Y" to switch color on the fly. This is a cheat that will trick your opponent ;)
